sysdevops.title: Raspberry Pi & PC Server as Homelab
sysdevops.info: SSL configuration, domain setup, Nginx, log checking, setting up AdGuard, Nextcloud, and various other fun stuff.

sysdevops.title: TEB EDUKACJA
sysdevops.info: Configured and deployed Nginx as a centralized web server, and set up socket-based communication between PHP and Java for seamless data exchange.

sysdevops.title: AbexGuilds
sysdevops.info: Built for 700 players to manage guilds, schedule events, and track attendance. Set up the VPS and domain, and handled pulling and merging updates to the live server.

sysdevops.title: Rezervo
sysdevops.info: Deployed, updated, and maintained the Rezervo project in production. Containerized the app with Docker and configured it on a Debian server, ensuring reliability and performance.
